title: Nature Domain
content:
ure walking on the spikes takes 2d4 Piercing damage for every 1.5m it moves.The spikes are difficult terrain, halving a creature's Movement Speed.

18m 6m Concentration

Spiritual Weapon

Summons a floating, spectral weapon that attacks your enemies alongside you.

1d8+Spellcasting Ability ModifierForce

Create a sound-proof sphere. All within are Silenced and Immune to Thunder damage.

Range: 18m Radius: 6m Concentration

Create an undead servant from a corpse.

The target must be a Medium or S
